Message of sympathy to Vietnamese prime minister
    Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, on July 15 sent a message of sympathy to Phan Van Khai, prime minister of the Vietnamese government, in connection with big human and material losses caused by typhoon that hit the northern provinces of his country.
 The message expressed deep sympathy to him and, through him, to the inhabitants in the afflicted areas.    
 The message expressed belief that the Vietnamese government and people would recover from the natural calamities and bring their living to normal as early as possible.
